name: umbrella
description: An umbrella repo that hosts all the LUME projects as git submodules in order to centralize management of all the projects.

scripts.install: npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.COMMENT bootstrap: bootstrap everything except readem, and then readem by itself, to avoid a circular link. (lume->readem->lume)
scripts.COMMENT purge: 'lerna clean --yes' removes all node_modules while 'lerna run clean' runs each project's particular 'clean' script.
scripts.reset: npm run purge && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.docs: npm run build && cd packages/lume && npm run docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && lerna run build
